name: The narrow passage
description:
The narrow passage is a game developed for "GameLoop Jam 03".

Head you ship through the narrow passage.
Use left and right arrows (or A/D)  to head the ship; avoid the rocks and reach the sea. Press space to carry sail and receive a speed boost.

Not recommended: you can run the game also via browser on a mobile phone but it may not work on a few devices or run slowly. In this case you can head the ship touching the specific buttons that will appear on the screen.

Credits:

- Ship, rocks and trees: Quaternius https://quaternius.com/
- Ocean audio, wind and collision sound: https://www.zapsplat.com
- UI and other musics and sounds: licenses acquired on HumbleBundle and belong to their respective owners
